Nemesis Enforcer/Manterror/Injector/Ramhorn/ Stinkbomb:


::Nemesis opens the locked CR chamber, the barrle of his rifle meeting FZ's 
face, spinning him around, the barrel moving to his back::
"Try anything, and there won't be any questioning."
::Nemesis motions for FZ to go to the torture chamber room::
"Follow me," he says to Perndabot, "keep an eye on the traitor, weapon out 
and be ont he look out."

========

::Injector fires off three stinger missiles at Sniper, a smile on his face::

::Manterror slammed a 'fist' on the computer:: "Where the slag is Hell 
Beast!?  A small order would help!"

::Ramhorn heard Sniper:: "My apologies, you just burst in here, didn't know 
what to think!" (Ramhorn yells over his sonic shells, a dozen of them sending 
Injector hitting the ground)

::Stinkbomb slowly got up, seeing Injector on the ground, he stabbed his tail 
forward, the seringed blade piercing Manterror's left elbow::

0000

::Manterror screamed, reaching back and firing an ion disk, then ripping a 
piece of the tail out, Stinkbomb had fallen backwards screaming as the disk 
had cut his tail almost half off::

"Hahahaha, you fool!  No one defeats the Manterror!" (A kick sent Stinkbomb 
into unconscioussnes)
